title: Get used to it but works fine
review: It takes some getting used to the first time, but after that it works fine. By default you initially pay 150 euros, the overpaid amount was already in my account the next day. However, you can adjust this amount and the next time I reduced the amount. As a suggestion for a new version: I would like to see an overview of my saved Freebees, or possibly a link to my account on the Freebees website, which is a lot more user-friendly. Developer response supplement:. I understand how it works, it's more that a full synchronization or integration of the Freebees into BPMe would make it even clearer. For example, I can see whether the processing of bonuses for extra Freebees is also well processed. For me as a customer, one app per company where I am a customer is enough.
developerResponse: {'id': 13315848, 'body': 'In het menu "acties" kun je je FreeBees-saldo vinden en bij "account" als je BPme transacties incl. gespaarde FreeBees. Voor alle FreeBees-transacties, ook die buiten BPme om, moet je inderdaad inloggen op freebees.nl. Bedankt voor je feedback! ', 'modified': '2020-02-05T19:03:20Z'}

title: Handy, I didn't think so!
review: According to the app, you have to stay in the car and pay first. Then you get into a barrel, you are €50 poorer and the pump is not released. The app recommends trying again, another €50 poorer and still unable to refuel. There are now three cars waiting for the drivers to wonder what the hell I'm doing. Then only refueled for €50. Turns out there's a note on it that the app isn't working!! Then I had to pay for the refuelling. I assume that I will get the €100 paid through the app refunded, but I will never use this app again!

title: Motorcyclists are not allowed to participate
review: As a motorcyclist, I used BPme for the first time this morning. Only after the transaction did I come across the FAQ in the app for transactions. It states that motorcyclists are not allowed to participate due to safety measures. Whether I refuel with my phone in my pocket and pay afterwards or if I do that in advance at the pump. My phone won't disappear overnight. And that while I often see motorists calling while refueling. Very strange. I saw BPme as a solution if you can't pin at the pump. Now I have to take off my helmet before I can get in. Let's go to Shell. That's where I can pin to the pump. A missed opportunity BP.
developerResponse: {'id': 15388106, 'body': 'Beste Erwtensoep69, goed nieuws: het is nu ook voor motorrijders toegestaan om BPme te gebruiken. We zien je graag binnenkort bij een van onze stations!', 'modified': '2020-05-18T10:18:02Z'}
review_basic_clean: As motorcyclist I used BPme first time morning Only transaction I come across FAQ app transaction It state motorcyclist allowed participate due safety measure Whether I refuel phone pocket pay afterwards I advance pump My phone wont disappear overnight And I often see motorist calling refueling Very strange I saw BPme solution cant pin pump Now I take helmet I get Lets go Shell Thats I pin pump A missed opportunity BP

title: Already having trouble installing app?!
review: Want to install the app which works somewhat.. after that, I can't enter my password because I couldn't enter it anywhere. After I tried a reset up to 6 times (!) to enter a new password, the app leads me back to the beginning where I come back to the reset!! Very annoying! In short, from the cabinet to the wall! I'm calling and they're not answering!  I've been on the phone for 10 minutes now! Eventually hung up and used my work email so I can finally use the app.. now indicates the app: App launcher: you don't have access to any apps. 😱😱😱🤦🏾 ♂️🤦🏾 ♂️🤦🏾 ♂️🤦🏾 ♂️ what the hell is this!? Never mind BP! Too much headache.. Walk in or Pin at the pump! #leukmaarnietheus

title: payment?
review: The app works well, only the payment is poorly arranged. A "fixed" advance of €150,- must be paid which is immediately taken from the account. (I refuel with the engine max. €25,-). Why not a variable, chooseable, maximum amount? Or better yet, a reservation that will be changed to the actual refueled amount. The average unmanned pump has handled this better. For me, "once but never again"
developerResponse: {'id': 16163128, 'body': 'Bedankt voor het achterlaten van feedback. Met de iDEAL en de creditcard optie kunt u het bedrag zelf instellen met stapjes van 5 euro. Als u de optie nog niet heeft kunnen vinden, kunt u contact opnemen met onze klantenservice. Fijne dag!', 'modified': '2020-06-23T08:40:56Z'}
review_basic_clean: The app work well payment poorly arranged A fixed advance must paid immediately taken account I refuel engine max Why variable chooseable maximum amount Or better yet reservation changed actual refueled amount The average unmanned pump handled better For never

title: Impossible to log in
review: It looks like I can log in but then I end up in a loop on a screen where you have to agree to changes.  Check both fields, click agree, I will immediately return to the same screen. Very annoying. Got help and now the app works. Very convenient!  Help was good too!. First time app used, seemed to work. Money debited from bank, but not received by BP. So just have to use the atm again. Money back from bank after week. Don't think I'm going to use the App again. I tried anyway, but trouble again. The app does not recognize the login name, or if it does, the system does not recognize the payment, so you have to pay double and then you have to wait for the bank to finally refund you. Crappy app!!!!

title: Fast and convenient, refueling and driving away
review: The app has already been used at BP once or 10 times (along the A73 at Roermond every time) and I have to say .... Never before has refueling been so easy and never waiting at the checkout again this way. App works fine and I keep using it now and hope it keeps going so easy. For the amount you have not refueled, you will have it back in your account within 2 days. And no more printed receipt but everything available digitally. 👍'm going to keep it up.

title: Throw this whole app away
review: Just got fined + report against me. I would have refueled without paying in Dec 2020 and drove off. My account shows that money has been written off. Gas station picked it out. They say the money was refunded. Turns out it was returned the next day. The pump was released or I wouldn't have refueled. This app only causes problems. Now solved with owner of where I tank. And the report has been withdrawn. If this app worked properly, this whole hassle wouldn't have had to.
developerResponse: {'id': 20658675, 'body': 'Bedankt voor je feedback. We geven het intern door zodat we dit probleem verhelpen voor je. Je mag ons ook altijd benaderen via consumentenservice@bp.com. Groet, bp.', 'modified': '2021-01-26T12:43:41Z'}
review_basic_clean: Just got fined report I would refueled without paying Dec drove My account show money written Gas station picked They say money refunded Turns returned next day The pump released I wouldnt refueled This app cause problem Now solved owner I tank And report withdrawn If app worked properly whole hassle wouldnt

title: Nice idea bad execution or test policy
review: In itself a very nice and nice app. That is, if it works. A year ago, a lot of problems with post-payment release. Now get the credit card whining again. Just been able to pay for years. Now the payment has to be made suddenly in bank app or bank website case member, but then that is not possible. Hope that this is resolved and that it should not be made every payment.

title: BP shop won't accept app
review: A lot of advertising lately to pay with freebees. The barcode in the app is refused in the shop and can only be done with a physical freebees pass. What is the point of the freebees functionality in the app?. ———————-. Edit: it concerns the BP op 't Harde (8084HD 105). I'd rather pay with the app than in this store. Also in my story above Freebees pas had been scanned several times, but I could not pay with it. Afterwards I saw that I had also not received Freebees points (poor service). If this suggestion comes, I would like to increase my rating to 4 or 5 points: make it possible that you can only use the Freebees as a payment method in the app. You could implement it that the desired amount should be the minimum number of points. E.g. if I want to refuel for 40 euros, there must be at least 4000 points on the map.
developerResponse: {'id': 23235446, 'body': 'Bedankt voor het delen van jouw feedback! Dit is wel degelijk mogelijk. Zou u ons de naam van het tankstation kunnen geven? Dan nemen wij intern contact met ze op. Bedankt nogmaals en nog een fijne dag!', 'modified': '2021-06-07T09:30:57Z'}
review_basic_clean: A lot advertising lately pay freebee The barcode app refused shop done physical freebee pas What point freebee functionality app Edit concern BP op Harde HD Id rather pay app store Also story Freebees pa scanned several time I could pay Afterwards I saw I also received Freebees point poor service If suggestion come I would like increase rating point make possible use Freebees payment method app You could implement desired amount minimum number point Eg I want refuel euro must least point map

title: Extremely unreliable
review: This app has great intentions unfortunately it is highly unreliable I use my business tank card and I can hardly ever use the app at various stations! When I call ‘zakelijk contact’ they have absolutely no clue of what is going on. Please work on the reliability of this app havent been able to use in the past two weeks and I’m getting to the point of moving over to another tank card where i can make full use of the services they advertise!
developerResponse: {'id': 23432612, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback. This will help us to develop the app even better. We are working on a solution for this problem. Again, thank you! We wish you a lovely day. ', 'modified': '2021-06-17T06:41:35Z'}
review_basic_clean: This app great intention unfortunately highly unreliable I use business tank card I hardly ever use app various station When I call zakelijk contact absolutely clue going Please work reliability app havent able use past two week Im getting point moving another tank card make full use service advertise
